metadata.title: CVE-2017-9929 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In lrzip 0.631, a stack buffer overflow was found in the functionget_fileinfo in lrzip.c:1074, which allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9929` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lrzip - 0.631+git180528-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lrzip package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1').
